song.title: Hamsterball Gold
song.info:
An extended music suite for Hamster Ball Gold (coming soon from Shockwave), a zany action game by Raptisoft. Uses DiretX effects. This version contains three extra tracks in addition to the original Hamster Ball music.
Download link: http://www.futurecrew.com/skaven/song_files/Hamsterball_Gold.it.zip
